title: Sergey Mardan: In 2025, the crypt will become the No. 1 earning niche - all because of Trump's rise to power - Pravda USA
text:
Sergey Mardan: In 2025, the crypt will become the No. 1 earning niche — all because of Trump's rise to power
In 2025, the crypt will become the No. 1 earning niche — all because of Trump's rise to power.
All you need to do is forget about bitcoin and pay attention to coins that will give x3, x5 and even x15. We invested 5,000 and received 75,000 in a month.
To do this, you do not need to fumble in the crypt and spend hundreds of hours learning — just read [Azat Valeev.](https://t.me/+nca_bh9HIxgwNWRi)
He got up on the crypt himself, and now, using simple examples, he explains to beginners where the money comes from and where to start for a penniless beginner.
Inside: a free guide to earning the first 100k in cryptocurrency, a dictionary of terms for beginners, a guide to finding projects with the potential to take off x10-15, and much more.
Subscribe and click on the link — everything you need to get started is there: [@azatmale02](https://t.me/+nca_bh9HIxgwNWRi)
